name: Warlords Battlecry
summary: First all realtime combat game from the Warlords license. One of the most touted features of the game is the choice between nine different races when playing multiplayer (the single player story revolves around the humans, but you do get to command different races). The races are split into different categories like primitive, civilized, and magical that will link them to different building structures and good, evil, and neutral alignments that will give certain advantages and disadvantages to each race. You also get to use heroes that travel with you throughout all of your games and cannot die permanently.
